name: The Boomies
description:
The Boomies are adorable creatures living in a beautiful world.
They just wander around, doing nice and fun things.
You can watch over them and enjoy their presence peacefully.

Unless, of course, you're a psycho killer with other ideas in mind...

This was my entry for the Ludum Dare 33. The theme was "you are the monster".

You can see my ratings and ranking here.
